Peirs Gaueston Earle of Cornvvall His life, death, and fortune. Drayton, Michael, 1563-1631.
[78] p.
Printed by I[ames] R[oberts] for N[icholas] L[ing] and Iohn Busby, and are to be sold at the west doore of Paules, At London : [1594?]
Dedication signed: Michaell Drayton. In verse. Roberts and Ling identified and publication date conjectured by STC. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery. Signatures: [A]² B-K⁴ L² (-L2).
=======
